channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Maid/The Cleaner
channel.description:
# **[color=steblue]The Maid[/color]**
**[color=steblue]Blue Dragon Social[/color]** **Dutiful(Passive)** - Immune to being occupied at night and immune to target changing. **Coffee Time(Day ability)** - Adds 40 more seconds to the day-time clock and removes the **[color=grey]Reaper[/color]**'s Chill(1 use) **Cleaning Time(Night ability)** - Target a player, if your target gets attacked, you will learn the faction of the attacker. If your target gets a conversion attempt, you will know of the attempt.(Infinite Uses)(Cannot use on the same target 2 nights in a row)
# **[color=purple]The Cleaner[/color]**
**[color=purple] Unseen Support[/color]** **Dutiful(Passive)** - Immune to being occupied at night and immune to target changing. **Coffee Time(Day ability)** - Adds 40 more seconds to the day-time clock and removes the [color=grey]Reaper[/color]'s Chill(1 use) **Tea Time(Day ability)** - Removes 25 seconds of the day-time clock.(1 use)(Will go straight to night when there's only 25 or less seconds left already) **Expert Cleaning(Night Ability)** - Follow the **[color=purple]Assassin[/color]**, if his target dies tonight, you will erase their Journal.(3 Uses)
# Context
I always thought that a class that can mess up with the day-time can be a challenging and fun class to play as and against.
The BD night ability can use some work, but as of now I couldn't think of a better ability to use there. Let me know if you have better suggestions.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Maid/The Cleaner
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
santana:

and removes the Reaper ’s Chill

“no class deserves a hard counter”

i know this isn’t exactly a hardcounter, but it’s still effective against it, and should be removed. NK win rates are already low enough as it is.

also maybe give maid more day abilities or something and another use of coffee but nerf it to 30 seconds. She doesn’t seem very powerful atm.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Maid/The Cleaner
item.dc:creator: santana
item.description:
Yea this could be removed, just thought that MAYBE it could be cool and sometimes be useful.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Maid/The Cleaner
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Or my Coroner.

The only way to make a non-confirmable Social class is to rely solely on system messages or make them faction-based such as the Spy’s feature of only removing feedback for scum.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Maid/The Cleaner
item.dc:creator: santana
item.description:
The Maid

Blue Dragon Social
Dutiful(Passive) - Immune to being occupied at night and immune to target changing.
Coffee Time(Day ability) - Adds 40 more seconds to the day-time clock and removes the Reaper’s Chill(1 use)
Cleaning Time(Night ability) - Target a player, if your target gets attacked, you will learn the faction of the attacker. If your target gets a conversion attempt, you will know of the attempt.(Infinite Uses)(Cannot use on the same target 2 nights in a row)

The Cleaner

Unseen Support
Dutiful(Passive) - Immune to being occupied at night and immune to target changing.
Coffee Time(Day ability) - Adds 40 more seconds to the day-time clock and removes the Reaper’s Chill(1 use)
Tea Time(Day ability) - Removes 25 seconds of the day-time clock.(1 use)(Will go straight to night when there’s only 25 or less seconds left already)
Expert Cleaning(Night Ability) - Follow the Assassin, if his target dies tonight, you will erase their Journal.(3 Uses)

Context

I always thought that a class that can mess up with the day-time can be a challenging and fun class to play as and against.

The BD night ability can use some work, but as of now I couldn’t think of a better ability to use there. Let me know if you have better suggestions.

Read full topic
